title: Burn Baby Burn
description: “It was the 80s & hot sticks and the “Burning Bush” hairstyle was the latest craze and my beautiful sister was rockin’ it.” (submitted by Patty) The post Burn Baby Burn appeared first on AwkwardFamilyPhotos.com.
